entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is leading the way, as mentioned by Harry.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is following Tonks and has a concealed eye staring at Harry.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is being asked by Harry about the location of St. Mungo's.

entities.name: st mungo’s
entities.description: St. Mungo's is a hospital for sick wizards, as mentioned by Mad-Eye.

entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is a location in the wizarding world where they couldn't find a suitable location for St. Mungo's.

relationships.description: Tonks is leading the way, and Moody is following her.
Mad-Eye explains to Harry that St. Mungo's is located nearby, and it was chosen because sick wizards can blend in with the crowd.
Diagon Alley was considered as a possible location for St. Mungo's, but it was deemed unsuitable.
